Package ca.hexanome04.splendorgame.model.action

Class Action

java.lang.Object
ca.hexanome04.splendorgame.model.action.Action
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyCardAction
public abstract class Action extends Object
An abstract action that can be performed on a game.
